Articles.Content:
Hey guys, just wanted to share my first Moon landing on full Realism Overhaul RP=0 and RSS.

http://postimg.org/image/f0bgbtjb9/

Had plenty of attempts before, some came pretty close.

Just before this mission, I got to the surface, only to realize the slope was too great, my wheels couldn't deal with the weight + slope and all went to hell.

Wasn't cheap, about 1.9M and 8 years to build.

Total mass on launch is a tad over 6.7m Tons

http://postimg.org/image/nl4s2zthh/

It always explodes the launchpad during launch, probably too heavy.

Sorry for the rockets been red, but my screenshot button is F11 XD

Reason for the heavy payload is all the batteries and scientific experiments. That vessel, after landing on the Moon, has enough resources to rover around different biomes for a few days, then decouple just the top with enough fuel to come back to Earth. Game crashes once after launch, once after landing on the Moon, once on the return home and once after landing back, all of that with textures 1/8. I can't wait to have all these mods working with KSP 1.1, enough of crappy textures and having to pass out on so many awesome mods.
